description:
Pixel Game Maker Series Rumble Dragon is a belt-scrolling action game with a retro flavor.

Take control of Alisa and Mark as they try to defeat the giant enemies!
The basic controls are punching and kicking, but you can also perform combo attacks by hitting buttons in rapid succession.

The game also supports sharing play, so two players can work together to clear the game!
Clear the game and you'll be in for a new treat!

The "Pixel Game Maker Series" is a series of games created using the action game creation software "Pixel Game Maker MV" that can be enjoyed on the Nintendo Switchâ„¢.
name: Pixel Game Maker Series RUMBLE DRAGON
intro:
The fifth installment in the fictional "GAME BUDDY" portable game series!
Work together to defeat the evil organization!
